title: Der Ausflug zum Zoo
translation: On Sunday morning, the whole family is awake early. Today they want to go to the zoo. Max is very excited because he loves animals. His little sister Anna is happy too. The parents pack water, bread, apples, and some cookies in a big bag. At nine o’clock, they all leave by car. The zoo is not far away. In front of the entrance, there are already many people. Max buys the tickets for his family. In the zoo, the children run to the monkeys. The monkeys jump and climb in the enclosure. Later, they see lions, giraffes, and elephants. Anna finds the little goats very cute. At lunchtime, the family sits in the shade and eats their bread. Then they go to the penguins. Max takes photos and laughs a lot. In the afternoon, everyone is tired but happy. They drive home and tell grandma about the nice day.
